english.segment1: You know that kind of girl. That makes your heart beat all fast?. You know that kind of love. That you know will last?. I knew that kind of girl. I knew that kind of love. But then she broke it off. When I was so sure of her
english.segment2: Don't trust that girl. She's up to no good. She'll mess with you. Like no one should
english.segment3: Empty promises thrown into the wind. Mirage vanishes, never to see again. Hey fellas, be you ware. Don't wanna end up like me. Another victim of her stupid female schemes
english.segment4: And so the time moves on. With feelings come and gone. And Christ is the One constant I can lean on. So now I am left here. Feeling like a schmuck. With one thought on my mind:_____________
